name: Octopus Computer Solutions
description: End to end web hosting solutions
overview:
Octopus Computer Solutions provides website hosting solutions including shared hosting, VPS, dedicated servers and cloud based solutions.

Octopus is using open source technologies along with customized utilities to assist the website owner to maintain its websites. Our cloud solutions are based on XEN technology, a full virtualization solution. We are currently developing our own cloud solution to maximize utilization of services per 1U.

We are a website developing company. Among our solutions is the OctopusCMS and OctopusFSS - Octopus Full Site Solution. These solutions provides a unique content management system for the website owner.
